==Profile==
Penny is the daughter of [[Parker]] and [[Barrow]], two wanderers who left her with their friend [[Rouge]] after they decided their nomadic lifestyle was not ideal for a child.<ref>{{Ref/Item|Rainbow Rose's Ideals}}</ref> The [[Traveler]] and [[Paimon]] meet her and her friends [[Don Quijano]] and [[Nana]], a cat and dog respectively, near the [[Waverider Waypoint]] southeast of [[Foggy Forest Path]].

Penny appears to have a close relationship with [[Morticia]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Leroy: Queen of the Night's Aria}}</ref>

===Appearance===
She has blonde hair, purple eyes, and wears a blue shirt.
